author: cmpilato
msg: More work on merge source normalization.  Getting closer, getting
(do_merge): Rework the docstring for this function.
function to permit two distinct URL/revision pairs as input.  Why?
So this thing can be a fully functional wrapper around do_merge().
(svn_client_merge3): Leave notes about some fixes that need doin'.
(svn_client_merge_peg3): The very nature of this function ensures
that the left and right side of the merge sources are related, so stop
calling do_merge() and always use discover_and_merge_children()
